pets.name: invisible-pet
pets.desc: It's nothing! Absolutely nothing! For those that hate pets. Jerk.

pets.name: tank-icon
pets.desc: Your own personal tank! It's small, compact, and good for going right next to your URL! Notice: Only one tank per user, while supplies last.

pets.name: chompy
pets.desc: It's Chompy! These adorable lil guys have been friends of Linerians for ages! They are as soft as marshmellows and like to dress up as their best friends if they're around them long enough! They also like to... yanno, chomp! They only eat fruits, though!

pets.name: elephant-small
pets.desc: It's like an elephant, but small!

pets.name: elf-like-creature
pets.desc: This little Elf Like Creature (ELC) is festive. Okay? It's festive.

pets.name: cool-frog
pets.desc:
That's one cool frog!

Note: Cool Frog does not like bullies so do not say anything mean to him.

pets.name: sushi-cat
pets.desc: Always starving, this cat needs their sushi!

pets.name: swf
pets.desc: It's an SWF! These guys contain so many different worlds in them. What could this one have?

pets.name: swf-blammed
pets.desc: Oh... This SWF doesn't look too good...

pets.name: rammy
pets.desc: This adorable ram will hit you really hard! Not here, though. Here they're just adorable!

pets.name: carrion-bird
pets.desc: It may be a pigeon covered in soot, but this loyal bird follows Captain Carrion wherever they go.
